data.author: JayEm

changelog.release_notes: Add lifted/header bars to replace the screen name after a few seconds

Improve colours
Support for Port/Starboard for AWA
More configuration options
Vibrate on no connection, add configuration via settings screen on Phone
Add configuration screen to select font option & race box presence.
Add splash screen & reintroduce colour support for scrolling fields

Add ability to lock the config functions to prevent accidental changes. 
Improve readability of screen reorder function

Add support for tack log to show history of up to previous tacks. 
Add distance to mark. 
Temporarily withdraw target speed to make space for other data. 
Prevent configuration of screens with mixed (pre & post start) data.

Add support for 3 field layout.  To get access to 3 field layout, you may have to do a reset to default fields.  Double click the centre select button.

App requires beta version of StartLine for Android.
Add auto transitioning from starting screens.  Beta version of Android StartLine app now available.
Bug fixes.  You will need to request a supported release of StartLine for Android from the developer via Google Play.

Bug fixes when creating new screens. Custom screens should be recreated.
Always vibrate as 0 burn to the line approaches regardless of what is displayed.
Improve font rendering - larger fonts. Add new data.
First public release - needs compatible StartLine app

data.description: StartLine is an Android app to help you start and race better on the water. This is the Pebble Time display app to replicate data from this excellent free StartLine Android phone sailing app onto the Pebble screen. Screens can have 2, 3, 4 or 6 fields all of which can be configured as desired. There can be up to 10 different screens. As you move from starting to racing, the screen will automatically transition to one showing racing data. See the app website URL for full usage instructions.  The Pebble Time version of the app replicates the colours used on the Android pre-start screens.

latest_release.release_notes: Add lifted/header bars to replace the screen name after a few seconds

data.title: StartLine for Pebble
